paragraphs.body: The Legend Continues is a ten-minute-long recap episode of ${link_0} narrated by ${link_1}, the voice of ${link_2}. It originally aired on September 15, 2007, on ${link_3}. In this recap, Katara retells some of the events that have occurred in ${link_4}'s journey in ${link_5}. It served as an introduction to the ${link_6} premiere, "${link_7}", which aired after it. Out of the two recaps of Avatar: The Last Airbender, the other one being "${link_8}", "The Legend Continues" is less known and not much is documented about it.
paragraphs.text: The Legend Continues is a ten-minute-long recap episode of Avatar: The Last Airbender narrated by Mae Whitman, the voice of Katara. It originally aired on September 15, 2007, on Nickelodeon. In this recap, Katara retells some of the events that have occurred in Aang's journey in Book Two: Earth. It served as an introduction to the Book Three: Fire premiere, "The Awakening", which aired after it. Out of the two recaps of Avatar: The Last Airbender, the other one being "The Legend So Far", "The Legend Continues" is less known and not much is documented about it.
